_meta.description: Stark Industries complete infrastructure - 36 servers + 295 workstations (CDX-E v3.1 standardized VM ID allocation)

network_bridges.description: Network bridges organized by site and function for network segmentation

deployment_notes: All templates stored on shared NAS storage
VM disks stored on local 'raid' storage per node
Linked clones used (not full clones) for efficiency
Geographic distribution for realistic latency simulation

legacy_servers.purpose: Provide varied OS platforms with different attack surfaces and security levels for realistic vulnerability testing

servers.legacy_note: Legacy servers from original configuration provide diverse attack surfaces
